raw_body: BULNER – NORAH AUDREY – Daughter of late Stanley Bulner and late Norah Bulner,​ sister of late Blanche,​ Patricia (UK),​ Norma,​ Reggie (Australia),​ sister-in-law of late Anton,​ late Ivor,​ late Joe (UK),​ late Gordon,​ Beryl (Australia). Fondly remembered by nephews & nieces. Remains lie at “Western Funeral Directors”,​ Old Negombo Road,​ Ja-Ela,​ on 08th August from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. Burial on 10th August at 3.30 p.m. at Roman Catholic Cemetery,​ Ekala.049261
